column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Mako says : " My cousin told me how level - headed you were during the whole evacuation .
#Text=Sometimes , a good evacuation is its own reward .
#Text=" Korra says : " Good to see you , Prince Wu .
#Text=Or should I say , King Wu ?
#Text=You ready to get back to Ba Sing Se and finally take the throne ?
#Text=" Wu says : " Yeah ... about that ... I was actually thinking of stepping down as king and getting rid of the monarchy all together .
#Text=" Mako says : " Are ... you joking ?
#Text=" Wu says : " For once , I 'm not .
#Text=Now I know what you 're gon na say , I 'm being lazy , I 'm afraid of responsibility , I 'm putting my singing career before my people , but it 's none of those things .
#Text=I really think the Earth Kingdom would be better off if the states were independent and had elected leaders , like the United Republic .
#Text=" Mako says : " That 's ... actually pretty wise and mature of you .
#Text=" Korra says : " I think it 's a great idea .
#Text=The Earth Kingdom should evolve , and I 'll do everything in my power to help you make that happen .
#Text=" Wu says : " Looking forward to working with you .
#Text=But for now , the dance floor calls .
#Text=" Korra says : " How 's the arm ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Much better .
#Text=" Korra says : " The words " thank you " do n't feel big enough for what you did .
#Text=But I honestly do n't know what else to say .
#Text=" Mako says : " You do n't need to say anything .
#Text=I want you to know , I 'll follow you into battle , no matter how crazy things get .
#Text=I 've got your back ... and I always will .
#Text="
